publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3313 Tommy Sheridan: Mismanagement in Further Education Colleges-That the Parliament invites the Scottish Executive, the Scottish Further Education Funding Council, the further education sector generally and education trade unions to conduct a full and urgent investigation into any mismanagement of further education colleges and any unfair treatment of trade union members and activists at the colleges, and condemns any such treatment.
S1M-3313 Mismanagement in Further Education Colleges (lodged on 19 August 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3313 Mismanagement in Further Education Colleges (lodged on 19 August 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3313 Mismanagement in Further Education Colleges (lodged on 19 August 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3313 Mismanagement in Further Education Colleges (lodged on 19 August 2002) Ms Sandra White*
